announcement.message: Welcome to WaveAny - completely free, open-source, and quickly build your product showcase website!

hero.subTitleEnd: showcase website in minutes, efficiently and elegantly!
hero.description: IndieShow is a Next.js template for building developer product showcase websites, no code required, allowing you to focus on product creation.
hero.slogan: Let creativity flow like waves, unique and powerful.

feature.description: An extremely optimized product website template based on Next.js, quickly build showcase sites. Launch quickly, easily obtain precise traffic, help independent developers focus on innovation, and win at the starting line!

rapidIteration.title: Rapid Iteration
rapidIteration.description: Continuous integration and rapid iterative development ensure the project stays up-to-date and enhances the development experience.

performanceOptimization.title: Performance Optimization
performanceOptimization.description: Leverage cutting-edge technologies to optimize performance, delivering a smooth user experience and improving website loading speed.

easyDeployment.title: Easy Deployment
easyDeployment.description: Simplified deployment process with an automated release system, enabling effortless project launch and reducing operational costs.

responsiveDesign.title: Responsive Design
responsiveDesign.description: Seamlessly adapts to various device sizes, from mobile to desktop, providing a consistent user experience.

globalSupport.title: Global Support
globalSupport.description: Built-in multilingual support system facilitates global deployment, helping products expand into international markets.

technicalSupport.title: Technical Support
technicalSupport.description: Professional technical support ensures worry-free product usage and resolves any issues during the launch process.

showcase.title: My Works
showcase.description: Explore our curated projects, each representing innovation and excellence.

project1.description: Product showcase website template based on Nuxt 3

project2.description: Product showcase website template based on Next.js 15

cta.title: Follow Us
cta.description: Get the latest updates and exclusive content. Let's explore the infinite possibilities of AI together!
